short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Binary, Decimal and Hexadecimal number base conversion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BHD Base Conversion converts positive binary, decimal and hexadecimal numbers up to 48 binary digits. 

This tool is perfect for efficient number conversion, including special features for calculating the 2's complement in both binary and hexadecimal formats. It also interprets and transform the binary number to signed decimal number. Suitable for developers, students, or anyone who is in need of dealing with base 2, base 10 and base 16 number systems.
